dcterms:description: The Vis-105H dataset contains images captured using a custom visible light OCT device that takes optic disc cubes from healthy subjects. It includes 105 pre-processed retinal Visible-light OCT images annotated for semantic segmentation into 7 classes, including the background.
dcterms:title: Vis-105H dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Li

H. Zou
X. Xu
M. Tang
M. Zhou
Y. Gan
J. He
Y. Ling
Y. Su
dcterms:description: The Glaucoma dataset consists of OCT images collected from 61 subjects, annotated into the optic disc and nine retinal layers. It is used for segmentation tasks related to glaucoma.
dcterms:title: Glaucoma dataset

dcterms:creator: S. J. Chiu
M. J. Allingham
P. S. Mettu
S. W. Cousins
J. A. Izatt
S. Farsiu
dcterms:description: The DME dataset includes OCT B-scans from patients with diabetic macular edema, annotated with nine layers. It is used for segmentation tasks in diabetic retinopathy.
dcterms:title: DME dataset
